name: Tome of the Eternal Flow
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After this character takes DMG or is healed: If this character has already been damaged or healed 2 times this Round, then this character's next attack this Round deals +2 additional DMG. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes DMG or is healed:</color> If this character has already been damaged or healed 2 times this Round, then this character's next attack this Round deals +2 additional DMG. (Once per Round)
